description: This simple salmon curry comes together quickly for a delicious, light midweek dinner.
name: Salmon With Green Pea Curry & Rice Noodles Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 5 large spring onions, sliced, green tips reserved

recipeInstructions.text: Add the frozen peas, basil, two thirds of the coriander, green curry paste, half the spring onions and coconut milk to a large saucepan on a medium heat, cover and simmer for 10 minutes.
Bring a large saucepan of water to the boil then turn off the heat and add the noodles. Leave to cook for 6-7 minutes until soft, then drain.
Heat the olive oil in a large wok on a medium high heat and cook salmon fillets for 3 minutes on each side, remove from the wok and cook the spring onions for 2 minutes.
Remove the pea curry from the heat and using a handheld blender, blitz the pea curry mix to a smooth, vibrant green sauce. Cook for 2 minutes to reheat.
Divide the pea sauce between four wide bowls and top each with noodles and salmon. Finish with chopped spring onion tips, a squeeze of lime juice and the remaining coriander and serve.
